attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Animal police
 have the sane powers as police ,in arresting ,convicting,and prison,sentences from 2 years to 20 for a range of neglect to down right cruelty to all animals
a ban on all poisonous animals of any kind
Very heavy fines from 500  to 10,000 pounds a check up once a year ,mandatory ,you fail to do this you will be arested ,fine or charged all animals to be reg with vetsput your idears here,

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
